languages.text:
Wielder has +1 Psy Power and +15 Persuasion
Daemons summoned by Perils of the Warp always attack closest non-Daemon target.

traits.locale_text:
Wielder has +1 Psy Power and +15 Persuasion
Daemons summoned by Perils of the Warp always attack closest non-Daemon target.

languages.text:
The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
If {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} is triggered and a daemon is summoned, that daemon attacks the closest to it non-daemon target.
languages.original_text:
Персонаж получает +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтингу{/g} и +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждению{/g}.
Если результатом {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угроз варпа{/g} становится появление демона, этот демон атакует ближайшую к себе цель, которая не является демоном.

traits.locale_text:
The wearer gains +1 psy rating and +15 Persuasion.
If the perils of the warp are triggered and a daemon is summoned, that daemon attacks the closest to it non-daemon target.

The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
If {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} is triggered and a daemon is summoned, that daemon attacks the closest to it non-daemon target.

The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
If {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} is triggered and a daemon is summoned, that daemon attacks the closest to it non-daemon target.

The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
If {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} is triggered and a daemon is summoned, that daemon attacks the closest to it non-daemon target.

languages.text:
Takan kişi, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesi{/g} ve +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}İkna{/g} yeteneği kazanır.
{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Öteboyut tehlikeleri{/g} tetiklenmiş ve bir iblis çağrılmışsa o iblis, en yakındaki iblis olmayan hedefe saldırır.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
If {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} is triggered and a daemon is summoned, that daemon attacks the closest to it non-daemon target.

traits.locale_text:
Takan kişi, +1 ruhsezi derecesi ve +15 İkna yeteneği kazanır.
Öteboyut tehlikeleri tetiklenmiş ve bir iblis çağrılmışsa o iblis, en yakındaki iblis olmayan hedefe saldırır.

Takan kişi, +1 ruhsezi derecesi ve +15 İkna yeteneği kazanır.
Öteboyut tehlikeleri tetiklenmiş ve bir iblis çağrılmışsa o iblis, en yakındaki iblis olmayan hedefe saldırır.

languages.text:
El portador obtiene +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} y +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasión{/g}.
Si se provocan {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g} y se invoca un daemon, ese daemon ataca al objetivo más próximo que no sea otro daemon.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
If {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} is triggered and a daemon is summoned, that daemon attacks the closest to it non-daemon target.

traits.locale_text:
El portador obtiene +1 de factor psíquico y +15 de Persuasión.
Si se provocan fatalidades de la disformidad y se invoca un daemon, ese daemon ataca al objetivo más próximo que no sea otro daemon.

languages.text:
装备者获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}、+15{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}。
如果{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}被触发，召唤出了恶魔，则被召唤出的恶魔会攻击距离最近的非恶魔单位。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
If {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} is triggered and a daemon is summoned, that daemon attacks the closest to it non-daemon target.

traits.locale_text:
装备者获得+1灵能等级、+15劝说。
如果亚空间的威胁被触发，召唤出了恶魔，则被召唤出的恶魔会攻击距离最近的非恶魔单位。

languages.text:
Der Träger erhält +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} und +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g}.
Wird "{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g}" ausgelöst und ein Dämon gerufen, greift dieser das nächststehende Ziel an, das kein Dämon ist.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
If {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} is triggered and a daemon is summoned, that daemon attacks the closest to it non-daemon target.

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger erhält +1 Psi-Wert und +15 Überredung.
Wird "Gefahren des Warp" ausgelöst und ein Dämon gerufen, greift dieser das nächststehende Ziel an, das kein Dämon ist.

languages.text:
Le porteur gagne +1 d'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} et +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
Si {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Périls du Warp{/g} est déclenché et qu'un démon est invoqué, ce dernier attaque la cible non démoniaque la plus proche.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
If {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} is triggered and a daemon is summoned, that daemon attacks the closest to it non-daemon target.

traits.locale_text:
Le porteur gagne +1 d'indice psy et +15 de Persuasion.
Si Périls du Warp est déclenché et qu'un démon est invoqué, ce dernier attaque la cible non démoniaque la plus proche.

languages.text:
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}が+1、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}説得{/g}が+15される。
{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な歪み{/g}が起こり、ディーモンが召喚された場合、そのディーモンは最も近い非ディーモンターゲットに攻撃する。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
If {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} is triggered and a daemon is summoned, that daemon attacks the closest to it non-daemon target.

traits.locale_text:
使用者は超能力レートが+1、説得が+15される。
危険な歪みが起こり、ディーモンが召喚された場合、そのディーモンは最も近い非ディーモンターゲットに攻撃する。

使用者は超能力レートが+1、説得が+15される。
危険な歪みが起こり、ディーモンが召喚された場合、そのディーモンは最も近い非ディーモンターゲットに攻撃する。
